</mxCell> <mxCell id="Ou7hjCVGm3fmFucae1As-9" value="POST <b>/api/login</b><div>{user, pwd, authMethod}&nbsp;</div>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ou7hjCVGm3fmFucae1As-12" value="response includs&nbsp;<b><font color="#fa6800">token</font></b> (HTTP Header) and <b><font color="#6a00ff">refresh_token</font></b> (HttpOnly id="Ou7hjCVGm3fmFucae1As-15" value="" style="curved=1;endArrow=none;html=1;rounded=0;strokeWidth=2;endFill=0;startArrow=classic;startFill=1;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="640" y="240" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="640" y="180" as="targetPoint" /> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="670" y="240" /> <mxPoint x="690" y="230" /> <mxPoint x="700" y="210" /> <mxPoint x="690" y="180" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ou7hjCVGm3fmFucae1As-17" value="<font color="#ffffff">2</font>" </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ou7hjCVGm3fmFucae1As-18" value="authenticate with credentials<div>create <font color="#fa6800"><b>token</b></font> and save <b><font color="#6a00ff">refresh_token</font></b> in DB</div>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="740" y="180" width="200" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ou7hjCVGm3fmFucae1As-19" value="<font style="font-size: 18px;"><b>User login</b></font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="210" y="350" width="30" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ou7hjCVGm3fmFucae1As-27" value="return 401 and token expired message" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="250" y="340" width="220" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ou7hjCVGm3fmFucae1As-28" value="<font color="#ffffff">2</font>" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;fillColor=#6a00ff;fontColor=#ffffff;strokeColor=#3700CC;" parent="1" vertex="1"> color="#fa6800">token</font></b><div>throw&nbsp;AuthenticationException</div>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="740" y="330" width="210" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ou7hjCVGm3fmFucae1As-30" value="<font style="font-size: 18px;"><b>Token Refresh</b></font>" y="479" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="640" y="479" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ou7hjCVGm3fmFucae1As-32" value="<font color="#ffffff">4</font>" width="250" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ou7hjCVGm3fmFucae1As-37" value="<font color="#ffffff">5</font>" </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ou7hjCVGm3fmFucae1As-38" value="verify request with <font color="#6a00ff"><b>refresh_token</b></font> create&nbsp;<b style=""><font color="#fa6800">new token</font></b>" <mxGeometry x="160" y="240" width="30" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="mEGVwH7zWuNsV7yE_BK--3" value="save <b><font color="#6a00ff">refresh_token</font></b> in </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>
